description: Guernsey's most senior politician tells his story in a debate over updating a sexual offences law.
title: Guernsey Deputy Gavin St Pier says he was sexual assault victim
title_page: Guernsey Deputy Gavin St Pier says he was sexual assault victim - BBC News
maintext: "We can and should ignore it no longer. We need systemic change to support victims, but most of all we need cultural change."
